mapper.select: SELECT survey_id, s_seq, question, a1, a2, a3, a4, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id, (select user_name from suser u where u.user_id = d.in_user_id) in_user_name from sdetail d where survey_id = :1
mapper.update: insert into sdetail ( survey_id, s_seq, question, a1, a2, a3, a4, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id ) values ( :1, :2, :3, :4, :5, :6, :7, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :8, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :9 )
update sdetail set question =:1, a1 =:2, a2 =:3, a3 =:4, a4 =:5, up_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), up_user_id =:6 where survey_id=:7 and s_seq=:8
delete from sdetail where survey_id = :7 and s_seq= :8
